name: The Frost Rebirth
description:
The game takes place in mountains covered with snow, trees and caves. They are inhabited by creatures far from civilization, ready to kill anyone but them. You went expedition and got lost. In this area, the main task is to survive. You need to look for or get food, water, equipment, defend against savages, build shelters and look for weapons to protect yourself. This place holds many secrets, and you need to reveal everything. This will help you survive and get out of these mountains alive. But you need to be attentive to details, notes and tips. They will help you get out of this ice trap.

Gameplay

  • Looking for loot
  • Hunting and surviving in the wild forest
  • Crafting and building
  • Explore world and complete story
  • Survive with friends
